body.name: Monitech Digital Camera Vlogging Camera, 4K 48MP Compact Camera for Photography with 2 Batteries,32GB SD Card, 16x Digital Zoom, 3.0 inch Screen,Camera for Beginners
features: 【16X DIGITAL ZOOM MINI CAMERA】★ This digital camera supports 16X digital zoom when you taking video or photos. You can zoom in or zoom out according to your specific shooting scene. With super wide angle lens, you can get 45% more field of vision. With micro lens, you can capture all details of an object. Just take as many photos as you want because our digital camera with 32GB SD card is big enough to save all the details.

【48MP & 4K DIGITAL CAMERA】★ Take this small digital camera, with 48MP high resolution, every great moment in your life will not be missed. At the same time, this digital video camera supports 4K high-definition video recording. With this mini digital camera, Beautiful scenery in traveling and great moments in having parties will be saved forever.

【VLOGGING CAMERA FOR YOUTUBE】★ This video camera supports 4K video mode. You can share your life at any time, anywhere. You can also get clear audio with the built-in microphone in our vlogging camera. It’s a great YouTube camera for youtubers. At the same time, you can use this 4K YouTube camera as webcam. Connect it with computer, then, you can use this YouTube camera kit as webcam in live broadcast or video call with friends.

【POINT AND SHOOT DIGITAL CAMERAS】★ If you are a photography beginner and want to buy cameras for photography, this 4K camera is very suitable for you. You can take photo or video quickly after turning on our digital cameras without much work. Just point and it will shoot, then, you will get the photo you want. Besides, our digital camera for teens is a great gift for your kids for birthday, Christmas or Thanksgiving Day.

【VIDEO CAMERA-SERVICE】★ A good after-sale service is a guarantee for your shopping. You will get 1 year warranty and 24-hour after-sales service for our small camera from the moment you order our compact camera. If you have any question or suggestion, contact us freely(There is our information in your order detail, you can contact us directly over there).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No view finder
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought as a gift and it works for what you pay but you can't look through a view finder or zoom in with the lens .It's a learning curve to figure out all the buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Here's what happened- I read the information and the reviews so I decided to go for it.Here's why I didn't like the product and would not recommend it to anyone even if you are a beginner photographer.1. pixel picture quality is blurry. It is not at all good. looks like an old time camera quality. Might as well stick with your phone and take pictures that way.2. as you zoom, quality doesnt improve. still look blurry.3. takes a moment to fine tune itself. you have to press on the capture button halfway and let it focus and then press it all the way down or else you are really looking at a picture of nothing but blurriness.5. Flash just makes the picture all white.4. Instructions that came with the camera and packaging was nice. that's about it. Id buy this camera for maybe a toddler to play with but not anyone over teen age. Teens wouldn't even like the quality of this item.im so disappointed that I spent that money.

reviews.reviewerName: Do not order camera quality sucks
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
